name.en: Introduction to Global Navigation Satellite System

goal.en: "Introducing principle of satellite measurement from both lecture and hands-on practice. The lecture includes orbital mechanics, signal processing, positioning/navigation, and error analysis. The hands-on practice includes data collection, processing, validation, and application. This course covers satellite geodesy, gravimetric geodesy, and global navigation system, followed by data post-processing and adjustment computation."
goal.ch: 經由講授衛星導航系統之原理及實務操作使學生了解衛星運動、訊號處理、定位過程、誤差分析，並熟稔相關接收儀器的測量精度與使用時機，同時具備資料收集、處理、驗證、應用等獨立操作能力。本課程將以土木相關應用為主軸，除了探討測量方法與精度，對於工程施作、地質調查、水文監測與運輸管理皆能扮演輔助的角色。

content.en: "This course includes lecture and hands-on practice. The material specifying satellite operation and measurement covers satellite altimetry, gravity field, and Global Navigation Satellite System. The data collected are applied to geophysics, sea level, and gravity anomaly detection. Data processing, analysis, and adjustment computation are included in hands-on practice with a connection to scientific applications."
content.ch: 本課程包括原理介紹與分組實作。講授內容包括GNSS基本架構與定位方法 (每週約兩小時)。實作部分則分為室內RINEX資料處理，及室外操作手持與固定式接收機 (每週約一小時)。修課學生將分組達成當週實習目標與期末口頭/書面專題報告。學期間將有不定期課堂測驗。

textbook.en: "GPS: Theory and Practice, B. Hofmann-Wellenhof, H.Lichtenegger and J.Collins, 5th Revised Edition, Springer,Wien, New York, 2001. GPS Satellite Surveying, A. Leick, 3nd Edition, John Wiley & Sons, 2004."
textbook.ch: "衛星導航, 莊智清, 全華科技圖書, 2012."
